Package com.lmax.solana4j

Class Solana

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.Solana
public final class Solana extends Object
Utility class for Solana blockchain operations.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE

      public static final int MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE
      The maximum size for a message.

      This constant defines the maximum allowable size for a message in the Solana encoding. It is set to SolanaEncoding.MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
